Desc.entry: Provides an Anglican Church and community centre available for hire/local use (see separate entry). Activities include weekly lunch club for the elderly and infirm (see separate entry) and a week of activities for the elderly during August. Monthly kids church with cooked meal. Runs occasional courses. Holds Summer Fayre in June and Christmas Fayre in November.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Thurs 10am-12.30pm (lunch club), 3.45-5.45pm (Kids Church, monthly), Sun at 10.30am (worship)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 2
